page.title: 11Burton School Field
page.content:
Our school is surrounded by a large field. We are now most likely going to lose it. The Council wants to sell our school field. We feel this is not good because it might stop some sports activities. The land was given for a school and sports field by Major Campbell, who used to live in Burton Hall, a large Georgian house adjacent to the school.
The field is a great asset to our school, but not absolutely essential. We could just fit in our running track without it, but it is good to have the field so that we can do sports activities and play tennis and block in the summer. The Education Committee wants our field as it needs the money for books, schools, interior decor, playgrounds, etc. in other parts of the County.
